Functions of three variables
======================

<http://tropic.ssec.wisc.edu/real-time/mimic-tpw/natl/main.html>

Problem: 
* Estimate the derivative with respect to time at a point, say, 100 mi east of the southern tip of Florida. 
* Estimate the derivative with respect to longitude at that point at [a given time]
* What do you think the gradient function with respect to latitude and longitude might represent?  Tell a story about what's happening physically in terms of the weather.
